name: TrainerVR
description: TrainerVR is a unique physics-based VR train construction game. In TrainerVR you can create from simple tracks to an elaborate rail network, just like the wooden piece game, but to the infinity and beyond. If you liked building with your own bare hands, youâ€™ll feel the same in our limitless VR world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
